title: Export Filter Already Working
content:
VERIFICATION: Export Filter Application Already Implemented

The analysis document inferred export filters might not be working, but code review confirmed they ARE fully implemented:

ARCHITECTURE:
1. popup.js: filterLogsByExportSettings() function (lines 323-335)
   - Filters logs by checking category against export settings
   - Fail-safe for uncategorized logs (always included)

2. popup.js: exportAllLogs() function (lines 369-380)
   - Gets export filter settings from storage
   - Applies filter to all collected logs
   - Logs before/after counts and percentage

3. Integration: Called in export workflow before generating file

PATTERN: Synchronous filtering with fail-safe defaults
STATUS: âœ… Already working correctly
NO FIX NEEDED: Just verification

Both live console AND export filters were already properly implemented despite user concerns. The actual issue was keyboard logging noise making debugging difficult to verify the filters were working.
